item.description:
MY APOLOGIES... THERE WILL BE NO DECEMBER MEETING DUE TO THE HOLIDAYS...

In this challenging real estate market, It?s Time to Move Up! your professional skills or it?s time to leave the business. What do you plan on doing? Meet new clients, new business partners, and learn something new at this month?s event?. ?It?s Time to Move Up? networking events are designed to be unique by combining business networking, social networking and continuing education.

For more information about this month's event, go to www.itstimetomoveup.tv and click on "Networking Events".

Network with like minded individuals and professionals!

"It's Time to Move Up" networking events are designed to be unique by combining business networking, social networking and continuing education. Check out the website at http://www.itstimetom... for more information.


Event Agenda

6:00pm - 7:00pm -> Open Networking
7:00pm - 7:10pm -> Introduction
7:10pm - 7:30pm -> Special presentation (changes every month)
7:30pm - 9:00pm -> Open Networking

Appetizers will be served... Check out the venue website at http://www.fuji1546.c... for more information.

It's time for a change... It's Time to Move Up!

Make it a great day,
Ruben
raustria@maximamortgages.com
item.name: It's Time to Move Up! Business & Networking January Meetup
